#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long res[100][100];

long long din(int x, int y){
    if(res[x][y]!=0)return res[x][y];
    if(x==0)return res[x][y]=1ll;
    if(y==0)return res[x][y]=1ll;
    return res[x][y]=din(x-1,y)+din(x,y-1);
}

int main(){
    int x,y;
    memset(res,0,sizeof res);
    cin>>x>>y;
    cout<<din(x,y)<<endl;
}
